snippet: Residents and local reporters in Harrisburg, Ill., chronicled the aftermath of the tornado that ripped through the small city early Wednesday.
abstract: Residents and local reporters in Harrisburg, Ill., chronicled the aftermath of the tornado that ripped through the small city early Wednesday.

byline.original: By JENNIFER PRESTON and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

headline.main: In Illinois Town, Scenes of Devastation
